metadata.Title: CVE-2018-14599 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in libX11 through 1.6.5. The function XListExtensions in ListExt.c is vulnerable to an off-by-one error caused by malicious server responses, leading to DoS or possibly unspecified other impact.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-14599` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libx11-6 - 2:1.6.3-1ubuntu2.1
libx11-data - 2:1.6.3-1ubuntu2.1
libx11-xcb1 - 2:1.6.3-1ubuntu2.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libx11 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:1.6.3-1ubuntu2.1').
